entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SQLite Query: Consider translating Sum to TOTAL #28101
  • Query: Reduce indentation in SqlTranslator #28098
  • Query: Provide a good story for calling into aggregate method call translator from QueryableMethodTranslator #28097
    7.0.0
  • Table-per-concrete-type (TPC) mapping no database generated identity column #28096
  • Not null sql column with -1 default value #28094
  • NavigationBaseIncludeIgnored exception raised when a class and its navigational property are of the same type. #28093

Closed

  • SQLite Query: Translate string.Join and Concat #28100
  • Full support for custom provider aggregate functions #22957
    7.0.0
  • .Where method cannot translate expression tree, despite the expression being correct #28095
  • ArgumentException thrown When GroupJoin is applied on a DbSet as a first join and NOT when applied as a second or later #27343
    7.0.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Provide a way to translate aggregate methods on top level #28102
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Query: Remove the requirement that instance or first argument would b… #28099
    auto-merge
  • Query: Add support for custom aggregate operators #28092
    auto-merge
  • Query: Use accurate generic types in group join flattening #28063
    auto-merge
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #28087
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Query: Use GetDiscriminatorValue for TPT and TPC #28070
  • SqlServer: Throw for split query with skip without order by #28056
    auto-merge
